summary: This simple mod adds 5 types of marijuana, sold by various merchants in skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod adds 5 types of marijuana to several fences and merchants in Skyrim. Now you can smoke a fatty of Tamriel\'s most epic buds during you\'re journey to conquer the world. They will have the following effects:


Winter Haze (Sold by Enthir in The Hall of Attainment)
***********
 -Fortify Magika 50pts for 120s
 -20% better prices for 120s
 -Cure Disease
 -Moderately powerful creatures in range won\'t fight for 30s
 -Minor visuals

Sanguine\'s Breath (Sold by Gulum \' Ei in The Winking Skeever)
*****************
 -40% harder to detect for 180s
 -Conjuration spells last 40% longer for 180s
 -Cure Disease
 -It\'s a real knockout ; )

Reach Peach (Sold by Tonilia in The Ragged Flaggon)
***********
 -Pickpocket is 40% better, 90s
 -Weapons and armor can be crafted or improved 30% better for 120s
 -Cure Disease

\'Fuzz\' Ro Dah (Sold in a couple secret places. Look for it!)
*************
 -Fortify Health 50pts for 120s      *  Do Not shout before you use this.    *
 -50% faster Shout recovery for 60s  *You will still have to wait to recover.*

Tolfdir\'s Haze (Sold by Enthir in the Hall of Attainment)
************** 
 -Fortify Magika Regen 100% for 120s    
 -Resist Magika 50% for 120s
 -Berserk for 60s (Take half damage; do double damage)


** You will need to progress far enough with the Thieve\'s Guild to access these merchants**
** Do not use more than 1 at a time. The combined effect may be overwhelming **


I appreciate any comments, suggestions and help :)

Thanks


I do not condone the use of illegal substances.


*  install to skyrim\\Data  * 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changelog:


v1.05
---------------
 -Added new mid-grade bud: \"Cyrodiilian Orange Bud\"
 -Added new low-grade bud: \"Elsweyrian Brown Bud\"
 -Modified prices of all buds
 -Toned down effects of all buds

v1.04
---------------
 -Gave all buds a better normal map
 -Made all buds a little smaller
 -The buds now cost much more (I felt the effects given should be reflected in price)

v1.03
---------------
 -All buds actually slow time!
 -Added new bud: \"\'Fuzz\' Ro Dah\"
 -Added new bud: \"Tolfdir\'s Haze\"
 -\'Fuzz\' Ro Dah is sold in a couple secret places
 -Enthir now sells Tolfdir\'s Haze
 -Gave all buds better textures ( I still need help making models  : /   )

v1.02
---------------
 -Added new bud: \"Sanguine\'s Breath\"
 -Added new bud: \"Reach Peach\"
 -Changed bud name \"Marijuana\" to \"Winter Haze\"
 -Tonilia now sells Reach Peach
 -Gulum \' Ei now sells Sanguine\'s Breath
 -Enthir now sells Winter Haze

v1.01
---------------
 -Changed model from Hanging Moss to retextured stock models (I need Modeling help!!)
 -Removed effect: Slow
 -Addect effect: Cure Disease
 -Added effect: Pacify Self and Area
 -Enthir now only carries 16
author: toasted --TheOnlytoasted--
